runs.comm: length ball goes across the batsman, left alone
short of length, comes back in a touch, hits the batsman on the thigh
length ball, defended towards mid-off
short of length delivery, pulled straight to midwicket
another one goes away with the angle, Levi tries to drive it without feet movement, it goes past the edge
fuller length on off stump, he gets off the mark with a push to wide mid-on
flatter on the off, Levi comes forward and inside edges it to midwicket
slow and on the middle, stops a bit after pitching, pushed towards mid-on for a single
dropped! Levi tries to send this out of the ground with a big sweep and top edges the ball over the keeper's head. Short third man and short fine leg run for it, but both miss the catch
pitched on the middle and tries to drive it towards on, gets an outside edge towards point
length ball on the middle, pushed towards mid-on
tries a yorker, but Levi turns it to deep midwicket for a single
another fuller ball outside off, the batsman blocks it and the ball bounces over the bowler's head towards mid-on, the batsmen take a single
fuller length outside off, Davids opens up and drives it over extra cover for a one-bounce four
bowls this one on the pads and it is easily flicked to deep backward square for a couple
fuller length delivery, driven hard but straight to mid-off
caught! tries to hoick it over midwicket, but the ball hits the inside half of the bat and goes tamely straight to square leg. Sorry Shaun
flat and short outside off, Faf punches it straight to cover
flatter delivery on off, the batsman inside edges it to the on side
short-ish delivery outside off, Faf goes back and wrists it away to deep midwicket
and a similar shot, this time by Davids for another single
gives this one a bit of air, batsman comes forward to defend that back to the bowler
this one is angled towards the pads and Davids just glances it for a boundary
takes a couple of steps down, but the ball is bowled on a length, defended towards the right of mid-on
fuller length ball around off, Faf walks across and whips this one through midwicket for a treble
length ball on the middle, Davids uses his feet again, punches it straight down the ground, to the left of mid-on who make a diving stop
short of length on off stump, Faf stays back and defends it towards the off side
makes room for this back of length delivery and smokes it through cover
super shot! picks a length ball straight back over the bowler's head. The only swing there was that of the bat.
short of length on the middle, the batsman makes room and hits it over point with the outside half of the bat
takes a couple of steps to this length ball, pushes it straight to cover
length ball on off, punched to cover off the back foot
short of length, that hurries on to the batsman as he attempts a pull, falls short of the short midwicket fielder
length ball outside off, a touch slower, Davids waits and plays a firm square drive, fielder at cover point makes a diving half-stop
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman uses his feet and drives it to wide long on
flatter delivery outside off, the batsman waits and turns it straight to square leg fielder
tossed up, gets some spin and that beats the batsman's swing
the batsman uses his feet, but can't beat the midwicket fielder
short and Faf goes for a powerful pull, it lands few metres short of deep midwicket
flatter on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
short of length and Davids rocks back in no time and finds the gap at deep midwicket. It just evades the fielder
another short ball but outside off, Davids plays it in the air, towards deep cover and runs a comfortable single
another shortish ball, on the body this time, but at Franklin's pace, it is easily pulled toward deep midwicket
goes down on one knee and whacks it over the keeper's head to bring up the fifty for SA
slower ball, it's almost a spinner's delivery and it is driven back to the bowler. Franklin should have expected that. He drops a regulation catch there.
slower length delivery on off, the batsman kind find the timing with his shot towards point
flat and short, comes a bit quicker off the surface, pushed back to the bowler
another quicker delivery, pushed back and the bowler fields
tossed up and Faf goes for the sweep, misses it completely and the bowler appeals. That would have goes down the leg side
see the batsman take a step and bowls it quicker down the leg side, Faf luckily gets some pad on it
flatter on the middle, punched to long on for a single
tossed up, Faf  tries to whack it to the cow corner, doesn't time it this time and only gets a couple
that is a proppa charge! Makes room to this tossed up delivery and lifts it high and long over the long-on fielder
flat and quick, the batsman comes forward and plays it towards wide long-on
and moves down a couple of steps, the ball was short and quick. He gets an inside edge towards square leg
slow and loopy, too slow for Faf as he charges out, dragged to deep midwicket
and a quick and full delivery now. Driven to long-on for a single
and this time he finds the gap at cow corner, with a full-toss.
dances down the wicket and drives this one hard to long-on
another full delivery on the middle, it is again driven to the long-on fielder
flatter delivery outside off, it is punched to long on for another single...errr. The fielder lets it go through his legs.That gives Davids his fifty.
on the middle, it is flicked past a diving short midwicket
swept hard to deep backward square leg
tossed up and full outside off, driven back to the bowler
tries to bowl a slower one, but slips out of his hands. Faf plays it from around his head towards the leg side. Warning for the bowler
short of length on the middle, the batsman pulls it in the air towards deep midwicket for a couple
short ball, bounces up to a decent height and Davids gets beaten on his attempted hook.

is that the catch of the century!! Davids made room and plays it in the air over cover. That looked like it was going for a boundary, till Neesham runs backward from mid-off and takes this diving full-length towards the boundary. He lands and skids a couple of metres towards the ropes, but stops himself in time. Neesham made it looked so easy...more than half of the 95% of the world would have not counted that as a chance
length delivery on the middle, defended towards cover
slower on the middle, the batsman plays it towards the vacant mid-on region
length ball on off, Miller drives it to mid-on
tossed up delivery on the middle, Faf just times it to the cow-corner
short and slow, Faf has to wait to pull that one, gets no timing but gets a single
flighted delivery on off and since it's slow, Miller has time to go back and pull it towards deep midwicket
length ball on the off, punched to cover off the back foot
full and flighted this time, Faf drives it hard but can't beat the cover fielder
slow and flighted, pitches on a length, Faf waits and turns it to square leg for a single
fuller length ball outside off, Faf wanted to play the dilscoop over short fine leg, but somehow plays it over the short third man!! How did he do that!!
tries the dilscoop again, but the ball goes over the leg stump this time
makes room and charges down, but Bracewell bowls it a touch wider, the batsman plays it over point without much timing
short of length on off, the batsman cuts it hard but Nicol at point makes a one-handed stop
fuller ball outside off, Faf - as he has been doing - plays a ramp shot over short fine leg. Franklin makes a sliding stop
short of length on off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it to wide mid-off for a single
slow and slightly short of length outside off, punched hard with timing towards deep cover.
fuller and flighted, driven in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
another one played with soft hands in the same region, they pick up another couple
fuller and on the middle, driven to the left of long-on, only a single this time
full and flat, driven hard to wide long-on for a single.
flatter, shorter, quicker. Punched off the back foot to long-off
flighted delivery, goes across the batsman who completely misses his drive
responds with a flat six, it was times superbly over long-off
fires it on to the pads, Miller tries to sweep but misses
and a full-toss now, Faf says thank you as he times it over the cow corner
and through cover this time. He makes room and drives this one hard all along the ground. No chance for the fielder
pushes this straight past the bowler for a single
bowls it full on the middle, Faf attempts the scoop again, but the ball hits the toe of the bat and goes towards square leg
full and on the off, blocked back to the bowler
full and on the middle, Faf gets to his fifty with another one of those paddle sweeps to the fine-leg boundary
makes room and hits this one hard through the covers for another boundary
gets beaten by the slower ball. He was shaping to play that scoop shot, but the ball was outside off, and slow
short of length on the middle, Faf turns it towards deep midwicket with soft hands and calls for a couple
how good is that!! The bowler comes round the wicket to Miller, bowls length and the batsman just drives it with some timing over extra cover, all the way over the boundary
short slower ball, the batsman has to wait for that one, it is pulled to deep midwicket but without much timing
short ball, a quicker one this time, Faf gets cramped for room, plays it to deep square leg awkwardly.
and another timed shot over extra cover! He made room to this back of length delivery and played a tennis forehand over cover for a one bounce four
length on the off and middle, this time Miller swings it over midwicket to the fielder in deep
and they keep on coming! Faf makes room and lofts this full delivery over the bowler's head for another boundary.
full and wide and Miller crashes it really really hard through cover. The fielder in the deep dives and get a hand to that, but the momentum on the ball takes it easily to the boundary
full and very wide, gives away an extra run
length ball outside off and Miller again times it sweetly but finds the fielder at the boundary. The fielder didn't have to move an inch. A little cameo comes to an end

caught at cover! tries to flick it towards square leg and gets a leading edge that goes as high as the towers. The fielder at cover makes no mistake and Bracewell is on a hat-trick. Faf's amazing innings comes to an end.
length ball, slammed hard to long-on

caught at point! length ball outside off, Peterson tries to smash it to ..somewhere.. gives it an almighty hoick, the ball takes the top edge and goes high.. very high..and comes down to the fielder at point
a Milleresque shot from Behardien to finish off. It was a length ball and the batsman just timed it over cover for a one-bounce four.
